link_desc:
SNMP Template for ESX-hosts. Discovers datastores, memory, VM's, CPU and interfaces. With a minimal set of graphs and triggers included.
To use the template, your ESX-hosts need to be configured for SNMP. That, how to install and use the template, can be found in the readme file.

Initaly based on the VMWare ESXi 5-template of Andrew Single
author: Jens Depuydt
